item.description:
PLEASE READ CAREFULLY. I bought 4 tickets for the game. I am using 2. So that leaves 2 for someone else. Fantastic seats! 10th yard line on the visitor side. Section 128 Row 5. I opted to go for an early buy opportunity so I purchased these through ACE tickets. This game will sell out fast so do not wait. In past years, I have had no luck in buying tickets for a regular season game. They would go on sale and by the time I get through to ticketmaster, they are gone. Even via online.
I will even save you the service and handliing charges. The cost is $400 for the pair. Get someone to go with you and it is $200 each. PLEASE make you plan to pay up front for the tickets before you RSVP yes. Last time I had to turn people down and reopen RSVP a few times, because people were not prepared to pay when saying yes. So lets cut down on the email traffic and think before you say yes. Much appreciated :)
item.how_to_find_us: Tickets will be mailed to you once I get them from ACE Tickets
item.name: PATS vs Bills
